price: Kuma Ubangijinku Ubangiji* Guda ne. Bãbu wani Ubangiji fãce Shi, Mai rahama, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
footnotes: * Ubangiji Shi ne Mai rãyarwa da matarwa, Mai umurni da hani kuma Mai halattãwa da haramtãwa. Ãyar da ke bin wannan tanã nũna dalilan sãmuwarSa da kaɗaitarSa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun lā ilāha illā huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
